channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- RSVPMaker
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- RSVPMaker

item.title: CVE-2021-24371|2024-08-03T19:28:23.827Z -- unknown -- rsvpmaker
item.description: The Import feature of the RSVPMaker WordPress plugin before 8.7.3 (/wp-admin/tools.php?page=rsvpmaker_export_screen) takes an URL input and calls curl on it, without first validating it to ensure it's a remote one. As a result, a high privilege user could use that feature to scan the internal network via a SSRF attack.
